OOC: Forget it, you cheap ass, you've been a pain in my ass ever since you =
came in. I thought I was bad, but YOU, you are greedy, stubborn, and selfis=
h. I repeat, you won't touch any of Alloran's old characters or Nemasis' ne=
w characters in a moding fashion...

  From=

, 2001 2:52 PM

nt to show off Shadow Star by having him take
  out a Maximal. By the way w=
ho's the weakest anyway? I
  want a char on a major faction who's somewhere=

privately, whenever you want.  I would love to

about Neo beast Wars RPG.  I had

 =
 >   > but none of them interested me, until NBW.  When

s

 the current list of

f egroups (now
  > Yahoogroups), and were

ch larger amount of members.  When i

  >   was 
  =
>   > Yanshosh, Kslawdogg, JP3884, and Inferno371. 
  > Soulstice was there=
 
  >   too, then

lbeast.  The Alliance
  > was there, but it

 ways

ut there

religiousness,

email

ut it.  For those that

or you, but for my friends here, feel free

r you

abs you by the wrist

est of this test and don't ask why

d is right

n on trial
